original_text: Each day for seven days, you must offer a male goat as a sin offering. You must also choose a young bull and a male sheep each day as sacrifices. They must all have nothing wrong with them.
korean_text: 칠 일 동안은 매일 염소 한 마리를 갖추어 속죄제물을 삼고 또 어린 수송아지 한 마리와 떼 가운데에서 숫양 한 마리를 흠 없는 것으로 갖출 것이며

sentences.original_text: you must offer a male goat as a sin offering
You must also choose a young bull
and a male sheep each day
They must all have nothing wrong with them
